description:
A versatile mid-layer that gives you options. The stretchy jersey fabric with brushed inside keeps you warm and comfortable, but the half-zip is there to be your personal fan for when things get too warm, giving you 2 options in 1.

  • Stretchy and soft jersey fabric with brushed inside feels soft and pillowy, just like your surroundings
  • Fabric is quick drying and moisture wicking to keep you at your best
  • The half-zip allows for ventilation when things get sweaty
  • The tight fit is great for layering, creating a versatile top to wear on its own or under a jacket
name: Craft Core Gain Midlayer - Men's
